title: Timers
description: Timers let you time various tasks through out the system.

config.timer_mode: Set to 1 it will only allow 1 timer to be running at a time (default). Set to 2 and it will allow multiple times to be running at the same time.
config.timer_automatic: Set to 1 to enable automatic timers on certain pages of the system
config.timer_enable_tickets: Set to 1 it will allow timers for tickets.
config.timer_enable_quotes: Set to 1 it will allow timers for quotes.
config.timer_enable_jobs: Set to 1 it will allow timers for jobs and job tasks.
config.timer_default_billable: Set to 1 to make all timers default to billable timers.
